name: 2024 The 8th International Conference on Advances in Artificial Intelligence
content: Publication: Honorable authors are cordially invited to contribute their research papers. All papers submitted to the conference will be subjected to the rigorous peer-review process. For accepted papers, it will be published in the ACM Conference Proceedings as before, which will be indexed by Scopus, EI Compendex and other academical databases.
organizers: Birmingham City University, UK, Science and Engineering Institute, USA, and Bubo.AI, UK
